languages.text: Отвлечь людей: провозгласить, что это кара Императора за терпимость к мутантам, и объявить охоту на отродий
Distract the people by proclaiming that this plight is the Emperor's punishment for their tolerance of mutants and declaring a hunt for the abominable scum
languages.original_text: Отвлечь людей: провозгласить, что это кара Императора за терпимость к мутантам, и объявить охоту на отродий

languages.text: Détourner l'attention des habitants en proclamant que cette épreuve est le châtiment de l'Empereur pour avoir toléré des mutants dans leurs rangs et en donnant la chasse aux immondes scélérats
languages.original_text: Distract the people by proclaiming that this plight is the Emperor's punishment for their tolerance of mutants and declaring a hunt for the abominable scum

traits.locale_text: Détourner l'attention des habitants en proclamant que cette épreuve est le châtiment de l'Empereur pour avoir toléré des mutants dans leurs rangs et en donnant la chasse aux immondes scélérats

languages.text: この窮状は、変異体に寛容であったことに対する皇帝の罰であると宣言し、忌まわしいクズどもを狩ることを表明して民衆の気をそらす。
languages.original_text: Distract the people by proclaiming that this plight is the Emperor's punishment for their tolerance of mutants and declaring a hunt for the abominable scum

traits.locale_text: この窮状は、変異体に寛容であったことに対する皇帝の罰であると宣言し、忌まわしいクズどもを狩ることを表明して民衆の気をそらす。

languages.text: 转移人民的注意力，下令追捕变种人，宣布这场灾难是由于人民对那些渣滓过于宽容，才招致了帝皇的惩罚
languages.original_text: Distract the people by proclaiming that this plight is the Emperor's punishment for their tolerance of mutants and declaring a hunt for the abominable scum

traits.locale_text: 转移人民的注意力，下令追捕变种人，宣布这场灾难是由于人民对那些渣滓过于宽容，才招致了帝皇的惩罚

languages.text: Distraer a la gente proclamando que esta situación es el castigo del Emperador por tolerar mutantes y declarar una cacería de esa escoria abominable.
languages.original_text: Distract the people by proclaiming that this plight is the Emperor's punishment for their tolerance of mutants and declaring a hunt for the abominable scum

traits.locale_text: Distraer a la gente proclamando que esta situación es el castigo del Emperador por tolerar mutantes y declarar una cacería de esa escoria abominable.

languages.text: Die Leute ablenken, indem du verkündest, dass diese Plackerei die Strafe des Imperators für ihre Toleranz gegenüber Mutanten ist, und indem du eine Jagd auf den schändlichen Abschaum ausrufst
languages.original_text: Distract the people by proclaiming that this plight is the Emperor's punishment for their tolerance of mutants and declaring a hunt for the abominable scum

languages.text: Bu musibetin, mutantlara gösterilen müsamahaya karşılık İmparator'un gazabı olduğunu ilan et ve bu iğrenç güruha karşı av başlatarak halkın dikkatini dağıt
languages.original_text: Distract the people by proclaiming that this plight is the Emperor's punishment for their tolerance of mutants and declaring a hunt for the abominable scum
